overview: This series shows you the possibilities that arise when two girls double up on a guy.  Featured cover girls Freya Mayer and Sonya Blaze make fast friends on a cruise, but Freya cant keep her lips off Sonya's boyfriend. Will Sonya be angry, or can they find a sexy solution? Sia Siberia and Stacy Cruz, Jill Kassidy and Athena Faris, and Zazie Skymm and Lilly Bella all turn up with tempting teamwork.
title: Threesome Fantasies 11
